title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: AE31002 3 - 0 - 0: 3 CreditsIntroduction, variational calculus, Hamilton s principle, Lagrange equation, Holzer, Myklestad method, vibrating string, standing wave and traveling wave solution, normal coordinates, orthogonality conditions, vibration beams (special problem), Timoshenko beams, longitudinal vibrations, parametric instability of structures.
